title: Wedding Planning
description: Unforgettable weddings crafted with care. Choose from Normal, Not Normal, or Crazy options at $5000, $6000, and $7000 respectively. Services include venue selection, decor planning, catering, entertainment, guest coordination, and exquisite floral arrangements.
description1: Our Wedding Package offers comprehensive event planning services tailored to make your special day unforgettable.

title: Birthday Party
description: Vibrant birthday celebrations tailored to your desires. Exciting, Adventure, and Epic options at $1500, $1700, and $1800. Services include venue decor, customized cakes, themed decorations, party games, favors, and professional photography.
description1: Celebrate your birthday with our Birthday Party Package, ensuring a fun-filled and memorable event for all.

title: Engagement Ceremony
description: Elegant engagements designed just for you. Classy, Elegant, and Opulent options at $2000, $2200, and $2300. Services include venue decor with floral arrangements, ring ceremony setup, catering, live music, professional photography, and guest seating.
description1: Mark the beginning of your journey together with our Engagement Ceremony Package, designed for elegant celebration.

title: Anniversary
description: Timeless anniversary celebrations filled with love. Romantic, Sentimental, and Timeless options at $1800, $2000, and $2100. Services include themed decor, dinner banquet, anniversary cake, speeches, music, floral centerpieces, and a memory lane slideshow.
description1: Celebrate the years of love and togetherness with our Anniversary Package, curated for a heartfelt and joyous occasion.

title: Retirement Party
description: Tranquil retirements celebrated in style. Serene, Peaceful, and Tranquil options at $1200, $1400, and $1500. Services include comfortable seating, retirement cake, refreshments, guest speaker, music, memory sharing, floral decor, and a heartfelt photo montage.
description1: Bid farewell to a fulfilling career with our Retirement Party Package, ensuring a relaxed and enjoyable retirement celebration.

title: Baby Shower
description: Charming baby showers filled with joy. Cute, Adorable, and Charming options at $1000, $1200, and $1300. Services include themed venue decor, games, desserts, gift opening, adorable props, photo booth, and heartfelt thank-you gifts for guests.
description1: Welcome the newest member of the family with our Baby Shower Package, filled with joy, laughter, and adorable moments.

title: Social Party
description: Lively social gatherings tailored for you. Lively, Vibrant, and Dynamic options at $800, $1000, and $1100. Services include customized decor, diverse catering, vibrant entertainment, interactive activities, and themed decor.
description1: Host a memorable social gathering with our Social Party Package, perfect for various occasions and celebrations.

title: Floral Services
description: Elegant floral arrangements for your event. Choose bouquets, centerpieces, archways, and more. Contact us for pricing. Elevate your celebration with opulent floral designs tailored to your theme and style.
description1: Enhance your event with our exquisite Floral Services, offering a variety of arrangements to add beauty and elegance.

title: Photograph Service
description: Capture your moments artistically. Professional editing, digital/print packages. Contact us for pricing. Our creative photographers ensure your event is captured in stunning detail, creating timeless memories tailored to your vision.
description1: Capture your best moments with our Photographer Service. Experienced photographers to create lasting memories.
